column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////While all of the dishes we got were absolutely delicious
column2: my three favorites were the garlic shrimp
column4: and the hanger steak. The shrimp was cooked to perfection and was a blast of flavor the moment you put it in your mouth
column5: yet not overwhelming. I'm not the biggest fan of garlic
column6: but the combination with lemon and the pepper flakes gave it the perfect kick of spice and tang. The same went with the squid
column7: which was chewy and tender. While this seems simple
column8: many places serve it way too chewy making it hard to tear apart and swallow. The hanger steak - nice and medium rare
